trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The firenewt can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the firenewt's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Imix's Blessing
entries: When the firenewt reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the firenewt gains 5 temporary hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The firenewt makes three Morningstar or Fire Ray attacks.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The firenewt casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):
